overview: Jamie O'Brien has produced his second sensational solo surf film, Freak Side. Surf cinematographer, Tim Reardon, has traveled the globe capturing the trials and tribulations of Jamie's truly terrific talent.  Free of ponderous pretence or pose, it's surfing stripped to performances of pure passion and precise power par excellence.  Sit back, take a swig ...  no SKULL your Red Bull, push play and prepare any previous parsimonious perceptions to be pounded by the prolific pilot of Pacific pulses, the prodigy of Pipeline, Jamie O'Brien.
title: Freak Side
